title: Google Assistant on my new Pixel 4 XL phone will not set a timer when I say "Ok Google, set a..."
content:
The Google Assistant on my new Pixel 4 XL phone will not set a timer when I say "Okay Google, set a 1-hour timer". It will say that the timer is set but it isn't, the timer is still at 00h00m00s.

However, if I unlock the phone and click the assistant logo and then say to set a 1-hour timer, then it will set the timer.

I have tried restarting the phone and removing the Google app updates and then reinstalling them. Google Assistant seems to work for the other commands I have given it but I haven't tested them all.

Here is a link to the community thread and I have tried all steps listed in it. It also shows others having the same issue.
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/21781845?msgid=21781845
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
